title: How do i fix this?
body: So when i get into a game, when it start's it say's ''Attempting to Reconnect'' and i don't know what to do, so what should i do i really need help.

replies.body: This error is usually caused by a network issue when it fails to communicate with the game server.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this and strengthen up your connection.  Let me know if you have any questions.
